Package adris.altoclef.tasksystem

Interface ITaskRequiresGrounded

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDoToEntityTask, AbstractKillEntityTask, ClearRegionTask, CustomBaritoneGoalTask, DestroyBlockTask, DodgeProjectilesTask, EscapeFromLavaTask, GetToBlockTask, GetToChunkTask, GetToEntityTask, GetToXZTask, GetToYTask, GetWithinRangeOfBlockTask, GoInDirectionXZTask, KillEntityTask, KillPlayerTask, PickupDroppedItemTask, PlaceBlockTask, PlaceStructureBlockTask, RunAwayFromCreepersTask, RunAwayFromEntitiesTask, RunAwayFromHostilesTask, RunAwayFromPositionTask, ShearSheepTask, TimeoutWanderTask
public interface ITaskRequiresGrounded
Some tasks may mess up royally if we interrupt them while mid air. For instance, if we're doing some parkour and a baritone task is stopped, the player will fall to whatever is below them, perhaps their death.
